medium: Pen and black and blue ink on wove paper
title: View of Siracusa
marks: Title LRC, in blue: [Siracusa presa (?) d al\' Teatro]; U
description: ruins, an ancient theater with semicircular descending rows of seating; water in distance with sailboats; island with buildings in center backgroundt; foliage and buildings in foreground, with four figures--three standing and one seated, drawing
